title: Bow To Me
description: When Samantha Boward is transferred to Loshano High School, Kaitlyn Noles has no idea that her life is about to change both for the better, and for the worse. Emotions are at a high as Kaitlyn struggles to identify herself and her sexuality.Kaitlyn is now forced to face not only the difficulties associated with homosexuality, but also, one of the world's deadliest diseases--addiction.
author: G.C. Julien
